Subject: Federal Government
Description: Government will leverage its large gas portfolio to ensure that gas development is undertaken in accordance with Nigeria’s Gas Legislation

Subject: Ministry
Description: A National Petroleum Policy Directorate will be established within the Ministry to act as a technical back office of the Minister in his policy making role.

Subject: Ministry
Description: The Ministry oversees or tracks the progress of the National Petroleum Policy Directorate.

Subject: Ministry
Description: The Ministry employs the Gas Policy Division for policy implementation in the gas sector.

Description: The Ministry employs the Oil Policy Division for policy implementation in the oil sector.

Subject: Ministry
Description: The Ministry collaborates with Niger Delta to resolve the Niger Delta militancy issues.

Subject: Investment Promotion Office
Description: The Investment Promotion Office will work with the Ministry to promote investment opportunities in Nigeria.

Subject: Ministry
Description: The Ministry partners with the Investment Promotion Office to promote investment opportunities in Nigeria.

Subject: National Gas Focal Point
Description: The National Gas Focal Point shall be a Senior person in the Ministry charged with oversight on the practical implementation of the gas policy, overcoming any obstacles and ensuring consensus and a coordinated development among all the participants.

Subject: Oil and Gas Policy Divisions
Description: The dedicated “Project Desks” within the Oil and Gas Policy Divisions will serve as Interface between project developers and Government. The Project desks will not duplicate the activities of other departments or agencies of the Government or the regulator. Instead, their role essentially will be to lobby and push projects or programmes provided for or relevant to the Gas Policy through Government. Their job will be to engage and fully involve other parts of Government and the private sector to ensure that projects or programmes are implemented.

Subject: Oben
Description: Oben addresses the issue of gas market operation in Nigeria.

Subject: Nigeria

Subject: Eligible Suppliers
Description: The downstream segment will be open for wholesale gas supply by Eligible Suppliers to any Eligible Offtaker who may commercially bypass distribution licensees consistent with the open access rules.

Subject: Government
Description: the government prefers the utilisation of flared gas into markets, utilised by different downstream sectors, rather than flared or re-injected with no valid technical reason.

Subject: New Flare Capture Technologies
Description: The government plans to open an industry consultation mechanism to ensure flaring targets are feasible and regulations are realistic.

Subject: Government
Description: The government will work collaboratively with industry, development partners, providers of flare-capture technologies, and third-party investors to develop flare capture and utilization projects.

Subject: Nigeria
Description: Gas development must be undertaken in accordance with Nigeria’s national socio-economic development priorities. Accordingly, the government through the MPR and with support from NNPC and industry will produce a Gas Resource Management Plan.

Subject: National Gas Infrastructure Blueprint
Description: The government will identify the key gas infrastructure needs and make appropriate recommendations for upgrading the design of the existing National Gas Infrastructure Blueprint to support the Gas Resource Management Plan.

Subject: Gas Master Plan Infrastructure Blueprint
Description: The Gas Master Plan Infrastructure Blueprint will be reviewed to ensure alignment with the Gas Resource Management Plan.

Subject: National Strategic Gas Reserve
Description: The National Strategic Gas Reserve will be reserved for future development and will be part of the Gas Resource Management Plan.

Subject: Nigerian LNG Company
Description: Europe is one of the main destinations for Nigerian LNG exports.

Subject: Nigerian LNG Company
Description: South America is one of the main destinations for Nigerian LNG exports.

Subject: Russian Gazprom
Description: As an example of the concept, Russian Gazprom has an equity shareholding in the UK-Belgium Gas Interconnector.
